column3: ACK on the code changes, but one nitpick: can you separate the git commit summary (the first line) and the rest? Some git tools assume everything up to the first empty line is the summary.\n
Compiles just fine on Windows and causes no obvious problems, can't really comment on the changes though.\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/bfc96207998c284e2cb6eb99c99b755a161e723d for binaries and test log.\n
